comments_since_last_sample.body: You did a fantastic job, it is cozy & warm & I love the colors

Only two things I don't agree with. The huge mirror opposite the bed - a slim bookcase diy'd would have been better (not to mention a mirror opposite your bed is very bad feng shui), and the chair is not suitable for working from home.
Oh Chico wishing you a good recovery 🤗
Great Job! Looks really great.

This is probably the most well done makeovers of yours! Very well executed, and actually had practical solutions. Everything goes well with everything. Small changes that make such a big impact! (Quick tip: can use a small wide dresser as an ottoman at the foot of the bed for extra storage and as a space divider!)

I absolutely love this makeover AG! Only thing I would say is the dining room chair for WFH is gonna be really uncomfortable. Would recommend a desk chair with arms instead!
But overall space looks incredible!
Chico get well soon, James LOL!!!! love this one!!
Brilliant job!
I love this makeover, except the dining chair as a desk chair. I did that for a year and it was a horrible!
You surpass yourself, especially wird the new duvet and the plants!
That bedspace was amazing. Love the tapestry and the colour scheme
All the best for Xico! He was missed. Loved the James appearance. 😁 and the way the condo turned out is amazing!
We need more of James’ Narration ❤️❤️❤️
Loving this studio fix! My alltime favorite! Beautiful colors!
Wow! What a difference! Good job you guys! Have you thought about a smaller sofa maybe or placing it differently? All in all I relly like it.
Please tell Xico avoid eating rice and potatoes for speedy recovery and if he can he must have 2 tumeric latte a day..... Or just put 2 to 3 pinch tumeric in warm milk if he's not vegan....
I am such a fan of James. He is so adorable 🥰
🐼 Big Bear Hugs from a 68 yr old grandma in Kirby, Texas, USA 🐼 ❤️ 🎀 ❤️ 🎀 ❤️
Speedy recovery to Xico. The place looks so much better! I would stick to the ergonomic chair instead of the dining chair, as personally my back can't take dining chairs
